title: SOMA - Undersea Outpost
description: Not a specific outpost, you might notice the outpost logo is the generic PATHOS-II one. Sorta.

title: SOMA - Window in an Undersea Base
description: I pixelarted one of the SOMA backgrounds. Pretty proud of it

title: SOMA - Ocean
description: Another pixelarted SOMA background (well. part of a background), pretty proud of this one too

title: Beach at Sunset
description: Finale piece from a little pixelart-off with a friend

title: Tree
description: Spent wayy too long on this one. But I think it was worth it

title: Alien Planet Scene
description: The pink waters and pale purpleish/reddish skies of an alien planet

title: Campfire
description: Piece made in a little pixelart-off with a friend

title: Half-Life 2 - Gravity Gun
description: If you've played Half-Life 2, you might (should) recognise this. I made this sprite for a Terraria mod

title: SOMA - Delta Sign
description: This is another SOMA inspired artwork. This time of a sign showing in glowing letters: DELTA

title: Leo
description: This is a portrait I created following this excellent video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3PQdx3o7gJA

title: Valley Scene
description: Was originally going to do a Scottish valley scene, but it turned out much brighter and cheerier than Scotland tends to be
